name: How Bad Can You Throw a 2 Run Lead in the Bottom of the Ninth
name_original: How Bad Can You Throw a 2 Run Lead in the Bottom of the Ninth
description:
It's the bottom of the ninth. There are two outs on the board. There are runners on 2nd, 3rd, and 4th. Your name is PolkaDot Zavala. How bad could this possibly go?

Sequel to my previous PolkaDot Zavala fan-thing, also published on this itch.
